articles.title: Alabama, Georgia arrive in frigid Indianapolis ahead of College Football Playoff Championship Game
articles.description: Alabama and Georgia arrived Friday night in Indianapolis, where the frigid temperatures had Crimson Tide coach Nick Saban admitting, "It's been pretty cold in Tuscaloosa the last day or two but not this cold."
articles.content:
INDIANAPOLIS -- Coach Nick Saban walked off Alabama's team plane Friday night to a cold, harsh reality.
When he returns to the airport for the final time this season, the Crimson Tide will either be… [+3090 chars]
